title: Electric field at center of triangle

content.question: Three particles having charges of equal magnitude Q are fixed at the corners of an equilateral triangle as shown above. Two of the charges are negative; the other is positive. Which of the following vectors best represents the direction of the resultant electric field at point P, the center of the triangle?

choices.label: An arrow is shown pointing toward the northwest direction.
An arrow is shown facing toward the southeast direction.
An arrow is shown facing toward the northeast direction.
An arrow is shown facing toward the southwest direction.
An arrow is shown facing toward the north direction.

content.answer: An arrow is shown pointing toward the northwest direction.
